cu.explanation_en: Setting the DRB ciphering flag to an invalid enum value 'invalid' will cause security configuration errors and prevent proper data radio bearer establishment.

du.explanation_en: Setting the maximum MIMO layers to an invalid value of 99 will cause antenna configuration errors and prevent proper MIMO transmission setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將最大 MIMO 層數設定為無效值 99 會導致天線配置錯誤，並阻止正確的 MIMO 傳輸設定。
